comment: So so so easy!
There is a lot of reading for this class, but it's really easy and goes by quick. The only reason I didn't get an A was that I missed one quiz.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She is very helpful and very easy grading criteria.
took her for online and tests were lockdown browser but no cam. pretty boring, since she just assigns readings from textbook but doable

Amazing professor! She genuinely wants her students to succeed and offers plenty of opportunities like extra credit to help your grade. Her class is straightforward, and it's nearly impossible to fail unless you're completely unmotivated. She's also super easy to reach if you ever need help or have questions.

Professor Ginn is an awesome instructor who really cares about her students. Clear expectations and her lectures kept me engaged. Definitely take notes during class and quizzes are pretty straightforward. Super fun - I'd 100% take her class again!
Dr Ginn is one of the nicest teachers I've ever had! She is passionate about education and cares about her students' success. If you're in communications, definitely sign up for one of her classes!

Professor Ginn was amazing! She had clear expectations on what you had to do to obtain a good grade in the course. The materials from this course helped me feel more competent as a communicator! There were 3 exams (open notes but lockdown browser), participation activities, revel quizzes, and career competency activities. She is very accessible!

I was so scared to take public speaking. Dr. Ginn is THE BEST professor to take for it. She is outrageously nice and caring. I went from being anxious to being ready to give speeches. This actually is the best course I've taken at KSU so far and it's all because of Dr. Ginn. DO NOT BUY TEXTBOOK (you won't need it) but you need to buy the workbook!

Ginn is the best. She's very sweet and caring and willing to help! She really does want to see students succeed. No homework (besides speech prep) and she goes over textbook topics in class, so I'd say it's pretty optional to buy. Also gives info about school events/extra credit assignments, and gives a LOT of easy participation grades.

While attendance is not mandatory every time, it is highly advised. The notes will be on revel and there are only two exams. The midterm and final. Very caring lady and the subjects were interesting. Don't forget to study because the chapters add up when its time for the tests. Over all she was very helpful and a good choice for  prerequisites.

Easy course. As long as you pay attention you will succeed. She really cares about her students and it shows in the amount of effort she puts into this class. You do work in groups and will randomly have participation grades throughout the semester so come to class! There are only two tests but as long as you do your revel quizzes you will be okay!
She loves her students and clearly enjoys teaching! She keeps lectures interesting and makes it easy to engage in class. She posts lecture notes after she goes over them in class.

I was worried about taking public speaking but Professor Ginn is super sweet, understanding, and made the class fun. The workbook gave you an outline for each speech, which made it easier. She gave a lot of extra credit, and brought treats. If you have to take public speaking then I recommend this professor!

Professor Ginn is a very good professor it just sucks that the university gives her such terrible content to teach. The class forces you to write speeches in a very specific manner. It really takes all the creativity out of it. I got a B simply because I was not used to having to use someone else's outline to make my speech.

Her class is super easy if you just show up and participate. She offers extra credit assignments, but they are a little time-consuming. Her tests and quizzes are online with no lockdown browser (same for the midterm and final). It really is a fun class!! I would definitely recommend her!

Her classes were my favorite of the semester! She is a very sweet person, and the class material was eye opening. Easy extra credit opportunities and easy (but time consuming) online modules to do. Take notes and show up to class and you will definitely get an A.

The online class consists of a midterm, a final exam, and a weekly discussion but only up to 5 counts. You also get a weekly online module homework to do not difficult but definitely takes some time. However, the homework can be done in less than 2-4hr if you work on it and take NOTES to study for exams. Professor responds to emails fairly quick.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Graded by few things

comment: Laid-back class, easygoing lectures. Attendance is not technically required, but there are a lot of participation points so show up! Offers plenty of extra credit opportunities too. Stay on top of your weekly textbook readings, as the lectures are based on what you learn there (and there are quizzes embedded in the readings). Really nice professor!

You only need to complete 5 out of the 13 written assignments for the whole semester. Homework is super easy. Tests are long and have many questions but I got good grades on them with minimal studying. There are only 2 so not worth stressing over. She's a good choice and provides an easy class.

A large part of the grade comes from the exams. They are long, being about 90 questions, but relatively easy. It is lockdown browser without a camera. As long as you pay attention to the reading, the exam is a breeze. The homework is quick and easy.

I would recommend Professor Ginn. She is an amazing professor. I took this class online as an elective class and I am glad that I did. I have learned so much from this class and I can put that info into becomi a teacher. This class is easy as long as you do the textbook quizzes that are due every week. Your test is open note.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: I LOVED HER CLASS! Her lectures were always fun and she knew how to teach her class. She gives outlines for the notes that help for the test. Weekly assignments on the textbook that are super easy, trust me. 1 midterm and 1 final, occasional participation points on random lecture days. 1 small project. Great class and professor.

Absolutely loved her! She made lectures so interesting! One online quiz per week (Quizlet will be your bff). Attendance isn't mandatory but there are participation activities most days that are for a grade (super easy 100s) Midterm and final are both online, 25% each. Pretty much guaranteed A in the class if you show up to class and take the tests

Professor Ginn is great. There are two tests, midterm and final (each worth 25%) and they are lockdown with NO WEBCAME. She encourages you to use your notes on the tests. You have weekly quizzes on the online textbook

I took this class for Honors and the class was pretty straightforward. Read one chapter and take a quiz. Be sure to read the textbook and you'll do okay. We did have to do a special presentation for honors but it was not that difficult.

Professor Ginn made this class so much more interesting than most do. She has weekly assignments due Sunday and everything can be found in the textbook. Two major tests and it's open notes with lockdown. Her discussions are short and easy to talk about, there is a lot of homework questions, but answers are easy to find. TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: i took honors com and loved it. weekly quizzes that are easy to follow, 2 tests, one presentation, and 5 written assignments. the class was easy and interesting and the assignments/presentations are short and fun to do because the topics are interesting. professor ginn was really nice and funny and genuinely cares about her students.

She is so sweet! The speeches are easy if you choose a unique topic you're passionate about. Yeah you'll have to do outlines but they help. Also please show up on time for the online class and present when she asks, it throws the whole class off and the person doing your peer review gets annoyed. Lastly, give her feedback when she speaks or asks!

I had her for my summer Human communication classes (along with 2 more classes) and overall as long as u turned in the assignments on time and genuinely tried in the discussions the course was easy. It was well planned out and an easy A.

AN ANGEL!!! This professor is seriously one of the nicest professors I have EVER. had. She feels SUPER relatable and easy to talk to. The tests are hard, very specific and weighted super heavy so make sure you study hard for them. This class is in no way an easy A but honestly the professor made it worth it to me. Would 100% take her again! <3

The workbook is whats needed. I did not get textbook, but others said it helped a lot more for mid-term . Our final was cancelled due to pandemic. She is a very lenient grader and helps to overcome fears of specking. As someone that does not enjoy ever public speaking I liked this class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: Quizzes and discussions were super easy but did not affect your average very much at all. midterm and final were pretty rough. other than that, she gives good feedback and is very helpful

This class online was definitely not an easy class. You need to study and study hard for the tests because they are weighed really heavy. If you put the effort and still struggling, she is willing to help and work with you. I recommend you to take this class with her but on campus.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Clear grading criteria

comment: This class is so hard online. There are 2 tests that is worth 200 points each, out of 500. We have lots of assignments to do every week that does so little for your grade. I studied for 2 weeks ahead for the exams and still did not do well. I would definitely have taken this class in class instead of online if I had the choice to do it again.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Graded by few things--Test heavy

comment: Two tests, midterm and final. Worth majority of the grade unfortunately. I spent a lot of time doing her written work assignments and revel work and it hardly affected my grade. Tests are not a "don't need to study a ton" bc it was a smack in the face. I def didn't study enough. Prof was great tho. I knew what I needed to do to get good grades.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Test heavy

comment: Do not take this class online. It is super hard and there are 2 tests that are super heavy. It will be hard to recover if you fail one of them. If I could do it again I would have taken this class in class and not online.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Graded by few things--Test heavy

comment: This class is super hard online. You have to take quizzes each week. However, you only get a total of 50 points for all quizzes and only 50 points for all 7 discussion post. There are only two test ( Midterm and Final) both worth 200 points a piece. If you fail either most likely you fail the class.. I dont recommend you take this course online!
She makes you go to a NCTA approve testing site to take your test even though the class is online. She also makes you pay $50 to take you test. Absolute waste of time and money

Mrs. Ginn is really nice. She gives great lectures and really seems like she enjoys teaching. Her tests are pretty straight forward; if you do the online homework and pay attention in lecture, you'll ace them easily.

Professor Ginn is amazing! Even though she lectures almost the whole duration of class, theyre so interesting and easy to follow along. Theres homework due every Monday, and in class participation activities (so attendance is mandatory), and four tests that compose your grade. As long as you show up and study, its definitely easy! Take her 100%!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Class has 4 test, revel quizzes due online every Monday, and in class assignments. She offers extra credit. Test are not cumulative and very easy. As long as you come to class and complete the weekly quizzes, you will get an A

My sweet Mrs. Ginn!! She is the sweetest professor ever. She is so sweet and is only here to help everyone out. She cares so much about her students and wants the absolute best for them. You have to do your work well to get an A, but its not hard! Very interesting class & you get close with the people in your class and it makes the speaking easy!
100% take this professor if you can. She is the most caring professor and she understands that public speaking is not easy. I would take her for every other communications class if I could.

Such an easy class. She makes Public Speaking way less nerve racking. She is a lenient grader and super nice and understanding. There are 5 speeches and 3 tests. The final isn't cumulative, but you need to study the book and take good notes to do well on the tests. If you're between this class and com1000 TAKE THIS ONE, even if you hate speaking.

She's a great professor. If you listen to the lectures you'll pass with at least a C but if you read the book, you'll do so much better. She's fun to listen to and makes the class interesting. she does assignments in class for attendance and participation. she gives extra credit.A lot of paperwork is involved and overall it's a pretty easy class.

Loved her! She is really sweet and understandable. You can definitely tell she cares about her students and wants to help you. Especially those with a fear of public speaking, she has a whole lecture on helping you calm down and minimize your anxieties.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Ginn is the teacher you want if you are taking Public Speaking. She helps you improve, and understands the nervousness of getting up in front of the class. Her lectures are short, clear, and understandable. She grades you on participation, speeches, and midterm/final which were all very easy and I felt well prepared for. Fantastic class.

She should have so much higher of a score. I took Public Speaking in class and it was one of the easiest classes I've ever taken. Her grading criteria is incredibly clear and the book comes with examples so as long as you follow it you're guaranteed an A. Don't buy the textbook just the workbook. Incredibly sweet and entertaining. Take her!!!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: You will be surprised how hard this class is for a seemingly easy communications class. The group projects can really hurt your grade if you are in a baddd group. You have to register with the proctor service for this class so study hard for your tests. You must be good at memorizing all of the words at the endof the chapters. No books /notes

I hate group projects online. The material seems simpple, but the exams are very difficult as you have to memorize 50 or more terms. You can't use your book because you have to have a camera on your computer with a proctor. I studied a great deal, but only pulled a C
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: The online class i s very difficult. Proctored exams online so don't plan on using any notes. Picky tests and group projects. take the classroom class. so much easier.
I loooove her. She is so welcoming and caring. She is funny and gives good lectures. She makes the class fun. You have to give your speeches, of course, but it is easy to pass!
The most basic teacher youll have, easy A, she says you need the book but you really dont
